And it kind of brings up a lot of questions. But like the physical really matters. Now, did Jesus remain sinless? Absolutely. Was he perfect? Yes. And yet in his perfection, he chose to engage with people who broke the definition of modesty in that culture and who, and who broke the definition of what it meant to be pure.

And in interacting with them, he was redefining again, what people had called evil and what people had called good. And he's just setting a new standard. And, and I think that's what a lot of some of his culture missed is like, first of all, the physical.

No, that's such a perfect way to end. But I'm just so thankful for both of you and your vulnerability and your ability to be articulate and gracious and dig into hard conversations. I value both a lot as friends and also as just our guests today. So thanks for being here.

I know. I feel like we could have just kept going. I know. I know.
